content.text: Match ends, Ponferradina 0, Mallorca 2.
Second Half ends, Ponferradina 0, Mallorca 2.
Attempt saved. Damià (Mallorca) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Pablo Infante (Ponferradina) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Abdoul Sissoko (Mallorca).
Attempt missed. Alfredo Ortuño (Mallorca) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Coro with a headed pass following a fast break.
Substitution, Mallorca. Coro replaces Lago Junior.
Attempt saved. Lago Junior (Mallorca) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Joan Oriol.
Offside, Mallorca. Biel Company tries a through ball, but Alfredo Ortuño is caught offside.
Own Goal by Andy, Ponferradina.  Ponferradina 0, Mallorca 2.
Alfredo Ortuño (Mallorca) hits the left post with a header from the right side of the six yard box. Assisted by Damià with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Roberto Santamaría.
Attempt saved. Lago Junior (Mallorca) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Pol Roigé with a through ball.
Attempt blocked. William Jebor (Ponferradina) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergio Aguza with a cross.
Substitution, Mallorca. Pol Roigé replaces Brandon.
Goal!  Ponferradina 0, Mallorca 1. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Jorge Casado (Ponferradina) is shown the yellow card.
